name: Ron Hall
text: Convenient location. Happy to see the Beyond Meat option. Fast service.

name: Brad Anderson
text: This was the best stuffed crust pizza i've ever had. Pork sausage and mushroom.

name: Amanda Cole
text: I like Pizza Hut....just not this store.  The man making the pizzas was not wearing gloves, and dropped several f-bombs while I sat waiting for my order.  We ordered the family pizza dinner box and paid extra to upgrade to cheese sticks. …More

text: I did not get my order for about 30 mins after the allowed time was to get my order.

text: The WORST store on the east side. Would much rather go to the one on 38th street. The food is gross and not cooked and the customer service is nonexistent with all the employees.

text: Wouldn’t do curbside. Made us come in to get the pie. Kinda pathetic.

text: This location has gone all the way down in quality of food and service. Never has a delivery driver on Sundays I know for sure don't remember any other days and I'm like  seriously why offer it if you cannot keep up with the demands. …More

text: I liked the thin crust pizza until the crust recipe changed.

text: Staff not helpful when I was trying to order my lunch. They came up with a total $18 for a personal pan w/sticks.foud a personal pan pizza for $5. Much better deal. Pizza no great, cold and blah.

text: Love this Pizza Hut . Kim is always really nice .

name: Tara Melton
text: I have not eaten Pizza Hut in a long time. The pizza and buffalo wings were great! The boneless chicken was not appealing to me. So, I did not try them. However, I did really enjoy everything else.

name: Lael Burson
text: Definitely worth a try.

name: Jarrett
text: The pizza was good, but the prices were kind of a lot. $5 for a personal pan pizza. The personal pane is only about 9 inches. I have gone to other pizza places that sell their large pizza for $5 or 6$.

name: Haley Reed
text:
very pleased with the new staff  the're very polite and gave excellent customer service along with great quality, with speed.
i will continue to eat here...

text: My wife called in an oder to be delivered for a wedding party, the person on the took the order and method of payment over the phone & said it would be delivered without giving a timeframe15 minutes later someone from Pizza Hut called my …More

text: I love this restaurant, they always have everything hot and fresh and the service is very fast.

name: Warren Lynn
text: Horrible service:  Walked in to place order, and waited for almost ten minutes before one of the at least three persons in the back came out to take my order. During that time I stood at counter so staff could see me through pizza warmer …More

text: Pizza was hot and fresh. It's a shame they don't deliver to our area anymore. I have to go pick it up.

text: It is RARE I leave poor reviews...this actually might be my first one ever...but WARNING we ordered from here online today. It said 55 min for carry out and 2 hours for delivery. I thought since it being super hot out and father’s day that …More

name: Jeff Cole
text: This place has gone way down hill in the past several months. They used to have a great staff and deliver great pizza. The last two visits here have been fiascos. Today we ordered online: three pizzas and a double order of bread sticks. …More

text: Great place .was clean and pizza was great ..as was the salad bar ..ty

name: Wayne Bender
text: Used to be good. Now I don't even know why they open their doors. Tried to place a carry-out order and the manger called and said they were closed (did not close for another hour) and said he's the only one there so he couldn't make the …More

name: Melissa Jones
text: Got placed on hold 3 different times, then hung up on 3 different times! Never even got to speak to anyone! Horrible way to treat customers, never ordering from here again

name: Jeremy Ott
text: Pizza wasn't out hutted.

name: Richard B
text: The pizza was very good.  In my opinion the Pizza Hut brand had gone downhill quite a bit over the last 20 years, but I was pleasantly surprised.  I will go back.

text: I've never left a negative review for any business, but I had a terrible experience with this store tonight. I ordered food at 5:40 and finally had it arrived for delivery at a little after 7. Half of my food did not arrive. I called the …More

text: We are always pleased with our order and appreciate being able to easily order online!

text: Absolutely horrible reviews! Well deserved Pizza Hut YUM Inc. should check the reviews and shut this place down! It's obvious by Every other review this business is poorly managed, provides very very very poor customer service!!!! We placed …More

text: Ordered at 3:54 pm... Told me to be here at 4:09. Showed up at 4:07 payed and am still waiting here at 4:25.  I used to work at Pizza Hut and it only takes 8-10 minutes to make a P'zone... Raising my review from a one start to a 3 only …More

text: terrible my pizza was not delivered to me! this place is run by criminals! never eating here again!

name: Mark Gilley
text: Ordered from here. Delivery was wrong then they wanted to make us wait until 30 or more to make it right. I dont leave reviews ever....first one. That should say something.

name: Lordja
text: I wish I didn't even have to give one star. This location messed my order up and when I called the manager said he just took over the store 2 weeks ago and was very belligerent on the phone and told me he wanted to punch me in my ugly face. I called the corporate office since I feel that this was totally out of line for anyone.

name: Glenn Merkle
text: I have ordered three from this restaurant and they have failed to deliver twice citing a lack of driver. I understand that you may be busy but if your delivery driver is failing, fire them and replace with someone who is more reliable. …More

name: ejf2461
text: This place should be shut down! Ran by criminals! Everytime you call this place they give you an excuse  why they cant deliver a pizza too you! 2 days in a row different excuses why they take your order. Worthless! Been the same for the last couple of years now!

name: Kyle Beavin
text: Ordered online and my entire order was messed up. Not just one item but all three items. I'm not one to complain, mistakes happen, but when I called at 9:45 to let them know they answer the phone "Pizza Hut we're closing." They obviously …More

text: Great location on Mitthoeffer been eating that Pizza Hut for about 20 years

text: Everytime I order from here it literally takes hours to receive everything I've ordered. I honestly don't know why i try with this place. All I ordered today was a 10 dollar box & a 2 liter of Pepsi. Food came in 40 mins but tell me why …More

text: Short 1 wing on my order, grabbed receipt to get the phone number, the only number on receipt was mine.  What kind of a place doesn't put their phone number on their receipt?  One that screws up too much.  3rd strike for me.  Good luck.
